headline: Trump needs to end the 'war on toys' from tariffs: Basic Fun! CEO
summary: Basic Fun! CEO Jay Foreman tells Yahoo Finance that President Trump has declared a "war on toys" this Christmas as the administration's tariff policies continue to pass costs onto US consumers and retailers. Foreman speaks to Julie Hyman about toy pricing trends and how the company is changing up their supply chain to account for tariff headwinds. Also catch Jay Foreman explain how tariffs are directly raising their product prices. Basic Fun! has licensing agreements to make and sell products from premier toy lines like My Little Pony, Hello Kitty, Tonka Trucks, Littlest Pet Shop, and Care Bears. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
